duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage multiple small to midsize architectural projects from initiation to completion, ensuring efficient and cost-effective execution.
Coordinate all project efforts, administrative and technical, to meet project goals and client satisfaction.
Prepare strategic plans to achieve project success, including scope of work, budgets, and schedules.
Estimate fees, determine scope of work, and prepare proposals and contracts for architectural projects.
Supervise a small staff of designers and technicians, providing guidance and fostering collaboration.
Apply diverse knowledge of architectural principles and practices in a broad array of assignments and related fields.
Communicate effectively with clients, municipal officials, and contractors to ensure project success and compliance with regulations.
Hold responsibility for finished plans, specifications, and approval of materials and construction for architectural projects.
Take initiative to learn new architectural skills and stay updated with industry trends and best practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Architecture from an accredited program (Licensure preferred)
